final_answer:
The humor in this image arises from the juxtaposition of two contrasting scenarios involving ducks.

On the left side, there's an image of a car stopping to let a duck and its ducklings safely cross the road. This is a common depiction of kindness towards animals. 

On the right side, there’s an image of a person heading towards a restaurant with a sign showing a duck on a plate, implying that ducks are served as food there. 

The satirical element comes from the contrast: despite the effort to protect ducks on the road, they paradoxically end up as a dish in the restaurant. This contrast highlights the conflicting attitudes toward animals as creatures to protect versus food to consume.
